title: Ep 18: Free Will and All This Mayhem
description: The Full Charge and I discuss the documentary "All this Mayhem" about the skateboarding champs Ben and Tas Pappas. Their descent into drugs, prison and chaos make one wonder if you can truly change your fate. They were born into a rough life and tried as hard as they could to escape it. But can you really change your destiny? Maybe, but shit ain't easy...
author: nadav@ymhstudios.com (Christina Pazsitzky)
